visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a line chart with the following specifications: Chart type: line, Chart title: Monthly Sales Data, Axes and labels styling: Use a dark gray color (#333333) for axis labels and titles, with a font size of 14px. Data series: Include one series named 'Sales' with the data provided in the JavaScript code. Custom colors: Use a gradient from blue to green for the line series. Additional configurations: Set the chart background to light gray (#F5F5F5), add a legend with a white background, and position it to the left of the chart with some margin.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a line chart titled 'Monthly Sales Data'. The chart type is set to 'line', and it includes a border with a specified color and width. The chart's background is set to light gray, and the title and axis labels are styled with a dark gray color and a font size of 14px. The x-axis categories represent the months of the year, and the y-axis title is 'Sales'. The legend is positioned to the left of the chart with a white background. The tooltip displays the series name and the corresponding data point. The data series is named 'Sales' and includes the provided data points, with the line color set to a gradient from blue to green.
